greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n >= 2} (1/log(n)^n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: digits = 105; NSum[1/Log[n]^n, {n, 2, Infinity}, NSumTerms -> 2*digits, WorkingPrecision -> digits+1] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits] & // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 21 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); [(&+[1/Log(k)^k: k in [2..1000]])]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 20 2018
(Sage) numerical_approx(sum(1/log(k)^k for k in [2..1000]), digits=100) # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 20 2018
results.author: Mark Hudson (mrmarkhudson(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 02 2004
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 16 2008 at the suggestion of _R. J. Mathar_
